original_text: Christian friends, remember the time when God called you to come to him. Think about what you were like. Not many of you were clever or powerful in the way that people think is good. Not many of you belonged to important families. Christian friends, remember the time when God called you to come to him. Think about what you were like. Not many of you were clever or powerful in the way that people think is good. Not many of you belonged to important families.
korean_text: 형제들아 너희를 부르심을 보라 육체를 따라 지혜로운 자가 많지 아니하며 능한 자가 많지 아니하며 문벌 좋은 자가 많지 아니하도다

sentences.original_text: remember the time when God called you
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님께서 너희를 부르셨던 그 때를 기억하라

sentences.original_text: Think about what you were like
Not many of you were clever
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 중 현명한 사람은 많지 않았다

sentences.original_text: or powerful in the way that people think is good
sentences.korean_translation: 또는 사람들이 좋다고 생각하는 방식으로 권위 있는 사람도

sentences.original_text: Not many of you belonged to important families
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 중 중요한 가문에 속한 사람은 많지 않았다

sentences.original_text: remember the time when God called you
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님께서 너희를 부르셨던 그 때를 기억하라
